headline.main: Zimbabwe to Pay Bonuses After Civil Servants Sit-In Protest
headline.print_headline: Zimbabwe to Pay Bonuses After Civil Servants Sit-In Protest

lead_paragraph: Zimbabwe's government on Monday agreed to pay outstanding cash bonuses, bringing an end to a brief sit-in protest by public workers, union leaders and a government minister said.
snippet: Zimbabwe's government on Monday agreed to pay outstanding cash bonuses, bringing an end to a brief sit-in protest by public workers, union leaders and a government minister said....
